transcript:
Customer: Hello, kuch nahi sunai de raha. Hello. Hello. Hello.
Customer: Haan bolo na.
Executive: Haan Wasim sir baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji boliye na.
Executive: Wasim sir good morning, Sunil baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Good morning, good morning sir, very good morning.
Executive: Aur kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Badhiya hai sir wo karana tha sir hamare ko.
Executive: Haan keyword vagaira ka keh rahe the na kuch corrections karane the sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha achcha, theek hai. To sir online aa jayiyega main aapko link share kar de raha hun. To kar lete hain isko.
Customer: Ah, theek hai sir main ek aadhe ghante mein aapko milta hun.
Executive: Achcha actually sir ne bola tha na ki aadhe ghante baad jo hai aap connect kar lenge to fir main maine isliye aapko aadhe ghante baad.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To main aapko sir link kis pe share karun aapka koi mail hai ya fir sir wali mail pe hi main bheju?
Customer: Sir wale mail par hi bhejo na major sd block@gmail.com pe.
Executive: Achcha achcha, theek hai sir. Haan haan usi pe bhejo.
Executive: Haan ek second main dekh le raha hun sir mail.
Customer: Ah main hounga to note down kar lo aap.
Executive: Ji ji, yahan pe primary registered mail id sir ka hi hai. To main sir wali mail id pe hi bhej de raha hun. Hai na aur usi se aap join kar lijiyega.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Chaliye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir main 11:30 ka bheju ya fir 11:45 ka bheju sir?
Customer: Aap 12 ka kar lo na.
Executive: 12 baje ka, theek hai main 12 baje ka kar deta hun.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Ah I think sir aapke pass mera number hoga. Pehle bhi hamari baat ho chuki hai sir pehle.
Customer: Haan haan hai na aapko number. Haan aapne shayad sir lagta hai ki Saturday ko call kiya hoga customer care pe. To wo call haan mere pass nahi aaya tha aur aapka number actually jo hai na yahan pe registered bhi nahi hai IndiaMART pe. To jaise registered number se call aati hai na to wo directly mere number pe aa jati hai.
Customer: Achcha ye aapka number nahi hai kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi ye jo hai ye customer service ka number hai. Customer care se call direct divert hui hai.
Customer: Number search kar raha hun ek minute. Haan baki main aapko ek second main isse pehle bhi sir hamari baat hui thi main aapko apna number jo hai pehle hi bhej deta hun.
Customer: 7905486084.
Executive: Haan haan sir yahi mera number hai sir yahi.
Customer: Achcha theek hai na.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay. Haan haan maine sir dekhiye link bhej diya hai mail pe link aa gaya hoga aapko.
Customer: Achcha achcha theek hai check kar leta hun main sir aapko call karta hun.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Theek hai ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to make corrections to keywords.

- Wants to connect after half an hour.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to share the link.

- Agreed to share the link on email.

- Agreed to send the link for 12:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the mail and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- keywords, corrections, link, email
